title: Agbe
author: Agbe

comments.author: Obari
comments.created_time: March 10, 2023, 02:39:47 PMLast edit: March 10, 2023, 06:52:09 PM by Obari
comments.body: Abeg with all due respect @Agbe I will like to know the bases on which I was mentioned here and e be like una dey use sentiment follow things and just make you know say no body be saint.This is a local board and Nigeria doesn't have one language but outside that we have the pigin language which is generally accepted and I really want to know why I got listed here but talking further and I will be glad you can update me to point out what prompted listing my name here  and you no expect me to close mouth when you don dey repeatedly dey point me finger for spamming and shit posting and I believe say this matter has been ironed out and I also want you to go review the links you posted and tell why my got listed on this thread.

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: Quote from: Agbe on March 10, 2023, 02:22:12 PM12. Nwada001: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5440687With all due respect... What exactly do you classify as "shitposting," if I may ask? The comment is:  QuoteThe right thing for anyone to do in this upcoming election is to vote. "Your vote is your right," so just do your part by voting first, but please play it safe if your pulling unit is not environmentally friendly and you shift to avoid being molested, harassed, or abused. I strongly believe this year's election will be different from the others. Let's just watch and see. All we pray for is a peaceful, free, and fair election. If you call this a "shitpost," you are equally telling me that my comment, which is my opinion over the past election, is trash, or are you suggesting I talk above what I know? For long I have not visited this thread, nah for me to kuku ghost my self for diz our local board, 2 avoid incoming wahala.

comments.author: Obari
comments.body: Quote from: Nwada001 on March 10, 2023, 02:41:26 PM nah for me to kuku ghost my self for diz our local board, 2 avoid incoming wahala. Bro I need @Agbe to come out here and clarify the reason to this post and what he truly classifies as shit post.I went through your profile and with all due respect I have more quality than you and I don't give a fuck what others think and say and @Agbe I dey para and I dey wait make you come clear me this matter make I no vex pass like this because you don scatter my whole day because to the best of my ability I be one person wey dey always kick against shit post and off topic post and I be person wey dey learn from everything at anytime but this is the height of it because you dey drag my name go mud for rubbish just because say you wan trend  and information reaching me be say this very thread was even prediscused before even posting it and @Agbe I'm still waiting for your clarity and I believe say I been get thread wey been dey kick against people making unreasonable post about elections https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5441320.msg61823012#msg61823012@Agbe I still dey wait for your response make I no vex pass like this because this matter no be childs matter because you dey even propose ban for say I post inside local board and just so you know that I was also once given the second position for one of the most active on the board and I'm sure them no go give me that reward if I been dey post shits or spam the board.@Agbe abeg I dey wait your response make you come clear the air how I take fall for this list and the statistics for classifying a post as a shit post.Abi make we leave this local board for you?

comments.author: Issa56
comments.body: Seriously I felt disappointed after seeing this thread, all of us here are from Nigeria and we all know why we are here, you think those people u mentioned are shit posters will be happy with you if they come across this thread?  the local board is not about just creating threads alone, we can also help each other, if you can message atleast one of those people and you can guide them about the forum and how to post, I don’t think it’s a bad idea, most of those accounts are junior members and most of them don’t really have anyone to guide them, you can atleast help them, we have to help each other if we want a better Nigeria, and not threatening each other. I went through your post history and I didn’t see anything special in your post since you joined the forum. How will u feel when you see your fellow Nigeria been ban in the forum and you are likely the cause?

Merit.s I am not interested to forward anyone to be ban, but we have to do the write thing. Even though not every time but at least to some extent. One love

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: OP, Although I have not lasted up to a year in this forum, I have seen the worst shitposts from some members in other boards within the period I have lasted in this forum. I am not against reporting and creating threads for shitposters or spammers because it's a way to keep the board clean and also reduce the level of low-quality or bad posts in this forum. Like I see on these forums, reports that are mostly taken seriously need enough references or evidence to prove the member guilty. I can see that a few names on your list have more than one reference, but considering that there have been no serious shitposts by some of these members. I want to ask, were the references on those memeber just all the references you could map them to? Those references are insufficient to label this a shitpost and perhaps even if few post are considered shit post, there are still other quality post made by them.I see that your account has long been registered in this forum, which I guess makes you more familiar with the forum than some of us here that just got registered recently. It would not be a bad idea to create a thread where you can mention any user that is going against the forum rules, such as spamming or shitposting, and then correct them.This is the Nigeria local board; you need to correct members here so that they don't go out to other serious boards to make the same mistakes. Warn them and point out their errors; if they continue to shitpost, then you can report to moderator. The local board should also serve as an avenue for helping your fellow citizens grow and learn. Most of these members are here to learn and also improve themselves. I love Nigerians; they are always smart people. If you teach them, they will learn. In my opinion, you should change the title of this thread to "warning for low-quality posts."Do you have any boards where all these mentioned users have been warned?

comments.author: I_Anime
comments.body: Quote from: Agbe on March 10, 2023, 02:22:12 PMRead these: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5430885.0, https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5436514.0, Warning has been given to the users who post trash in Nigeria Local Board to reduce the quality of post which the leaders struggled to achieved so before they disgrace the whole board we have to list them for international Moderators or admit to be Ban so that others can learn from it and these are spam posters with their posts, if your name has more than three post, then you are to be banned but there is a grace in the 1st page, and second compiling page and from the fourth downward will be send to Moderators to ban dem. U dey di list bcos u promote by, commenting on di spam post and creating threads on spamming.=5441263.0,7. I_Anime: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5440221.0 One LoveI never knew that this post will be taken as spam posts because I made it after the all news about the protest for the banned of the old naira notes.But I will love if you can explain in details what should be discussed in this Forum and also can the rules and regulations of this board be pin.All I want to see is us getting positive recognition and seeing this board grow

comments.author: Obari
comments.body: Quote from: Issa56 on March 10, 2023, 07:48:50 PMHow will u feel when you see your fellow Nigeria been ban in the forum and you are likely the cause?I guess happy and I really felt so bad even seeing a member who is trying so hard to meet up with requirements.I guess people like @Agbe dey get the concept of local board wrong and to me the major reason for local board to for people in same locality to meet up and discuss forum related issues and how to build the community and raise the awareness of Bitcoin in their nation and not to criticize them.@Agbe I hope you see am say life no be the way you think am and beside I been don see your merit so far and e be you have already done well for yourself so why you wan fustrate another person effort ?I had to check all the accounts listed and it seems they're mostly new accounts that needs guidance rather than criticism.You know how the country be and e no make sense say you dey carry your own spoil person own.E easy for you no mean say na so e easy for another person. Because if na so everybody for don get private jets or even you for no suppose dey this forum.@Agbe try make you fit edit the caption of this thread as e no make sense say we dey draw attention (negative ones) to ourselves and you go see am say plenty people go avoid this board and hope you fit occupy the whole board.We all know why we dey here and as long as you me naija and you dey active, you also need the bread so no need to make life hard for the next man.@agbe you dey owe levels and I dey wait

comments.author: Agbe

And I will create a comprehensive list for all the Spammers in the board.

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: You have don well my brother for keep this place as pure as snow. In as much as we are working for the progress of this board we are also open for corrections, to me here is a local board a place to groom and nature people in order for them to know there stands. I believe too well that nobody started here as a legendary or Hero member, so if you sense any error anywhere any place from our members here as a brother you have to send them pm for corrections all less such persons has refuses to adhere those corrections and instructions at that point we can boldly bring his names here for ban.My pipo say "pikin wey dey suck breast no dey carrry force stop breastfeeding, na small small them dey take stop to dey breastfeed them". So na small small we go take groom anyone wey we know say dey do shitposting here.GoodnightPadav cares

I believe say you be one of the persons wey enter here with strict mentorship and hence things wasn't that hard for you and there are other persons who figured here out all by themselves and they're really fighting through and make I also clear you say everybody's rate of assimilation will never be the same.I clicked on all the links you posted on your last post on this thread and I no see any post as spam except that of the hero member wey actually no be real spam as I check the time of posting and you could understand say most of this threads dey created out of frustrations person dey go through for the hand of the government and he fit no realize say person don already drop such thread hence as you tell am, he lock the thread and the truth be say you dey over do and e no sweet.@Agbe abeg rest no let pride finish you and I believe say life no end for forum and I don personally see person wey get very highly ranked account wey abandon the forum for other greater things of life.@Agbe if you can help direct the paths tenderly abeg carry all this your investigations go main boards no come dey worry people wey dey try come up for here

comments.author: Sexylizzy2813
comments.body: See I just dy look how the matter go be but is like this OP get pepper body this isn't how to address someone who's learning, and if you check some of us like me am new in this forum and we need you the senior ones to assist us grow, some nah hustle we call this place but e no mean say we go sell out our self just to get glory. For this country nah we dy use our hand finish ourselves and we con carry the whole life style come here dy betray ourselves? See we suppose look out for each other no matter what, if person no gree take warning just lock him post than to report am to higher authorities...OP take am easy no beef nobody no vex for anybody just carry us we wey your rank pass along but mind you, life na scratch my back I go scratch your own too... Mae we stay as one without quarrel e no go benefit us anything if continue to quarrel.Mr Obari and the rest we this hot water touch I go say make una no vex, we no go run leave this place for one person abeg... Make we know how to correct person, wisdom nai sure pass...Una well done!!!

comments.author: uchegod-21
comments.created_time: March 11, 2023, 04:13:01 PMLast edit: March 11, 2023, 04:24:40 PM by uchegod-21
comments.body: Agbe, in as much as I like your quest to keep Nigerian board sanitized, I do not like the idea behind this thread and I will suggest that you lock this thread.I have toured this whole forum and I can beat my chest and tell you that Nigerians aren't shit posters.This is because we work hard and also we were colonised by Britain, so English is not our problem. Even if our English will not be as standard as the owners like The Sceptical Chymist may want it, yet we are able to make connected sentences. Even in this thread, someone like Obari made better post here. If you see something that you feel is a shit post, report it to the moderators and that will be fine.Infact Nigeria should be the country with the best posters.If this thread is left open, it will give impression that Nigerians are shit posters which is far from the truth. I can even bet that Nigerians produce the most quality posts in the forum.  Check the posts of these users;CryptopreneurBrainboss;Charles-Tim;Smart Virus;Igebotz;Mpamaegbu;Upgrade00;Coyster;BIT-BENDER;SatoPrincess;Poka124RuchiMr right Oluwa-BtcWiwoDavidvictosonFivestar4everMVP Infact and all Nigerian users too numerous to mention, you will understand that we are known for quality. This is why Nigerians are always taking the best quality posts in Best_Change, Livescasino and other campaigns that give bonuses. Proudly a Nigerian and we are the best.
